46/*
47 * NV10-NV40 tiling helpers
48 */
49
50static void
51nv10_bo_update_tile_region(struct drm_device *dev, struct nouveau_drm_tile *reg,
52 u32 addr, u32 size, u32 pitch, u32 flags)
53{
54 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_drm(dev);
55 int i = reg - drm->tile.reg;
56 struct nvkm_device *device = nvxx_device(&drm->device);
57 struct nvkm_fb *fb = device->fb;
58 struct nvkm_fb_tile *tile = &fb->tile.region[i];
59
60 nouveau_fence_unref(&reg->fence);
61
62 if (tile->pitch)
63 nvkm_fb_tile_fini(fb, i, tile);
64
65 if (pitch)
66 nvkm_fb_tile_init(fb, i, addr, size, pitch, flags, tile);
67
68 nvkm_fb_tile_prog(fb, i, tile);
69}
70
71static struct nouveau_drm_tile *
72nv10_bo_get_tile_region(struct drm_device *dev, int i)
73{
74 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_drm(dev);
75 struct nouveau_drm_tile *tile = &drm->tile.reg[i];
76
77 spin_lock(&drm->tile.lock);
78
79 if (!tile->used &&
80 (!tile->fence || nouveau_fence_done(tile->fence)))
81 tile->used = true;
82 else
83 tile = NULL;
84
85 spin_unlock(&drm->tile.lock);
86 return tile;
87}
88
89static void
90nv10_bo_put_tile_region(struct drm_device *dev, struct nouveau_drm_tile *tile,
91 struct fence *fence)
92{
93 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_drm(dev);
94
95 if (tile) {
96 spin_lock(&drm->tile.lock);
97 tile->fence = (struct nouveau_fence *)fence_get(fence);
98 tile->used = false;
99 spin_unlock(&drm->tile.lock);
100 }
101}
102
103static struct nouveau_drm_tile *
104nv10_bo_set_tiling(struct drm_device *dev, u32 addr,
105 u32 size, u32 pitch, u32 flags)
106{
107 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_drm(dev);
108 struct nvkm_fb *fb = nvxx_fb(&drm->device);
109 struct nouveau_drm_tile *tile, *found = NULL;
110 int i;
111
112 for (i = 0; i < fb->tile.regions; i++) {
113 tile = nv10_bo_get_tile_region(dev, i);
114
115 if (pitch && !found) {
116 found = tile;
117 continue;
118
119 } else if (tile && fb->tile.region[i].pitch) {
120 /* Kill an unused tile region. */
121 nv10_bo_update_tile_region(dev, tile, 0, 0, 0, 0);
122 }
123
124 nv10_bo_put_tile_region(dev, tile, NULL);
125 }
126
127 if (found)
128 nv10_bo_update_tile_region(dev, found, addr, size,
129 pitch, flags);
130 return found;
131}
132
133static void
134nouveau_bo_del_ttm(struct ttm_buffer_object *bo)
135{
136 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_bdev(bo->bdev);
137 struct drm_device *dev = drm->dev;
138 struct nouveau_bo *nvbo = nouveau_bo(bo);
139
140 if (unlikely(nvbo->gem.filp))
141 DRM_ERROR("bo %p still attached to GEM object\n", bo);
142 WARN_ON(nvbo->pin_refcnt > 0);
143 nv10_bo_put_tile_region(dev, nvbo->tile, NULL);
144 kfree(nvbo);
145}
146
147static void
148nouveau_bo_fixup_align(struct nouveau_bo *nvbo, u32 flags,
149 int *align, int *size)
150{
151 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_bdev(nvbo->bo.bdev);
152 struct nvif_device *device = &drm->device;
153
154 if (device->info.family < NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_TESLA) {
155 if (nvbo->tile_mode) {
156 if (device->info.chipset >= 0x40) {
157 *align = 65536;
158 *size = roundup(*size, 64 * nvbo->tile_mode);
159
160 } else if (device->info.chipset >= 0x30) {
161 *align = 32768;
162 *size = roundup(*size, 64 * nvbo->tile_mode);
163
164 } else if (device->info.chipset >= 0x20) {
165 *align = 16384;
166 *size = roundup(*size, 64 * nvbo->tile_mode);
167
168 } else if (device->info.chipset >= 0x10) {
169 *align = 16384;
170 *size = roundup(*size, 32 * nvbo->tile_mode);
171 }
172 }
173 } else {
174 *size = roundup(*size, (1 << nvbo->page_shift));
175 *align = max((1 << nvbo->page_shift), *align);
176 }
177
178 *size = roundup(*size, PAGE_SIZE);
179}
180
181int
182nouveau_bo_new(struct drm_device *dev, int size, int align,
183 uint32_t flags, uint32_t tile_mode, uint32_t tile_flags,
184 struct sg_table *sg, struct reservation_object *robj,
185 struct nouveau_bo **pnvbo)
186{
187 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_drm(dev);
188 struct nouveau_bo *nvbo;
189 size_t acc_size;
190 int ret;
191 int type = ttm_bo_type_device;
192 int lpg_shift = 12;
193 int max_size;
194
195 if (drm->client.vm)
196 lpg_shift = drm->client.vm->mmu->lpg_shift;
197 max_size = INT_MAX & ~((1 << lpg_shift) - 1);
198
199 if (size <= 0 || size > max_size) {
200 NV_WARN(drm, "skipped size %x\n", (u32)size);
201 return -EINVAL;
202 }
203
204 if (sg)
205 type = ttm_bo_type_sg;
206
207 nvbo = kzalloc(sizeof(struct nouveau_bo), GFP_KERNEL);
208 if (!nvbo)
209 return -ENOMEM;
210 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&nvbo->head);
211 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&nvbo->entry);
212 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&nvbo->vma_list);
213 nvbo->tile_mode = tile_mode;
214 nvbo->tile_flags = tile_flags;
215 nvbo->bo.bdev = &drm->ttm.bdev;
216
217 if (!nvxx_device(&drm->device)->func->cpu_coherent)
218 nvbo->force_coherent = flags & TTM_PL_FLAG_UNCACHED;
219
220 nvbo->page_shift = 12;
221 if (drm->client.vm) {
222 if (!(flags & TTM_PL_FLAG_TT) && size > 256 * 1024)
223 nvbo->page_shift = drm->client.vm->mmu->lpg_shift;
224 }
225
226 nouveau_bo_fixup_align(nvbo, flags, &align, &size);
227 nvbo->bo.mem.num_pages = size >> PAGE_SHIFT;
228 nouveau_bo_placement_set(nvbo, flags, 0);
229
230 acc_size = ttm_bo_dma_acc_size(&drm->ttm.bdev, size,
231 sizeof(struct nouveau_bo));
232
233 ret = ttm_bo_init(&drm->ttm.bdev, &nvbo->bo, size,
234 type, &nvbo->placement,
235 align >> PAGE_SHIFT, false, NULL, acc_size, sg,
236 robj, nouveau_bo_del_ttm);
237 if (ret) {
238 /* ttm will call nouveau_bo_del_ttm if it fails.. */
239 return ret;
240 }
241
242 *pnvbo = nvbo;
243 return 0;
244}
245
246static void
247set_placement_list(struct ttm_place *pl, unsigned *n, uint32_t type, uint32_t flags)
248{
249 *n = 0;
250
251 if (type & TTM_PL_FLAG_VRAM)
252 pl[(*n)++].flags = TTM_PL_FLAG_VRAM | flags;
253 if (type & TTM_PL_FLAG_TT)
254 pl[(*n)++].flags = TTM_PL_FLAG_TT | flags;
255 if (type & TTM_PL_FLAG_SYSTEM)
256 pl[(*n)++].flags = TTM_PL_FLAG_SYSTEM | flags;
257}
258
259static void
260set_placement_range(struct nouveau_bo *nvbo, uint32_t type)
261{
262 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_bdev(nvbo->bo.bdev);
263 u32 vram_pages = drm->device.info.ram_size >> PAGE_SHIFT;
264 unsigned i, fpfn, lpfn;
265
266 if (drm->device.info.family == NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_CELSIUS &&
267 nvbo->tile_mode && (type & TTM_PL_FLAG_VRAM) &&
268 nvbo->bo.mem.num_pages < vram_pages / 4) {
269 /*
270 * Make sure that the color and depth buffers are handled
271 * by independent memory controller units. Up to a 9x
272 * speed up when alpha-blending and depth-test are enabled
273 * at the same time.
274 */
275 if (nvbo->tile_flags & NOUVEAU_GEM_TILE_ZETA) {
276 fpfn = vram_pages / 2;
277 lpfn = ~0;
278 } else {
279 fpfn = 0;
280 lpfn = vram_pages / 2;
281 }
282 for (i = 0; i < nvbo->placement.num_placement; ++i) {
283 nvbo->placements[i].fpfn = fpfn;
284 nvbo->placements[i].lpfn = lpfn;
285 }
286 for (i = 0; i < nvbo->placement.num_busy_placement; ++i) {
287 nvbo->busy_placements[i].fpfn = fpfn;
288 nvbo->busy_placements[i].lpfn = lpfn;
289 }
290 }
291}
292
293void
294nouveau_bo_placement_set(struct nouveau_bo *nvbo, uint32_t type, uint32_t busy)
295{
296 struct ttm_placement *pl = &nvbo->placement;
297 uint32_t flags = (nvbo->force_coherent ? TTM_PL_FLAG_UNCACHED :
298 TTM_PL_MASK_CACHING) |
299 (nvbo->pin_refcnt ? TTM_PL_FLAG_NO_EVICT : 0);
300
301 pl->placement = nvbo->placements;
302 set_placement_list(nvbo->placements, &pl->num_placement,
303 type, flags);
304
305 pl->busy_placement = nvbo->busy_placements;
306 set_placement_list(nvbo->busy_placements, &pl->num_busy_placement,
307 type | busy, flags);
308
309 set_placement_range(nvbo, type);
310}
311
312int
313nouveau_bo_pin(struct nouveau_bo *nvbo, uint32_t memtype, bool contig)
314{
315 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_bdev(nvbo->bo.bdev);
316 struct ttm_buffer_object *bo = &nvbo->bo;
317 bool force = false, evict = false;
318 int ret;
319
320 ret = ttm_bo_reserve(bo, false, false, false, NULL);
321 if (ret)
322 return ret;
323
324 if (drm->device.info.family >= NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_TESLA &&
325 memtype == TTM_PL_FLAG_VRAM && contig) {
326 if (nvbo->tile_flags & NOUVEAU_GEM_TILE_NONCONTIG) {
327 if (bo->mem.mem_type == TTM_PL_VRAM) {
328 struct nvkm_mem *mem = bo->mem.mm_node;
329 if (!list_is_singular(&mem->regions))
330 evict = true;
331 }
332 nvbo->tile_flags &= ~NOUVEAU_GEM_TILE_NONCONTIG;
333 force = true;
334 }
335 }
336
337 if (nvbo->pin_refcnt) {
338 if (!(memtype & (1 << bo->mem.mem_type)) || evict) {
339 NV_ERROR(drm, "bo %p pinned elsewhere: "
340 "0x%08x vs 0x%08x\n", bo,
341 1 << bo->mem.mem_type, memtype);
342 ret = -EBUSY;
343 }
344 nvbo->pin_refcnt++;
345 goto out;
346 }
347
348 if (evict) {
349 nouveau_bo_placement_set(nvbo, TTM_PL_FLAG_TT, 0);
350 ret = nouveau_bo_validate(nvbo, false, false);
351 if (ret)
352 goto out;
353 }
354
355 nvbo->pin_refcnt++;
356 nouveau_bo_placement_set(nvbo, memtype, 0);
357
358 /* drop pin_refcnt temporarily, so we don't trip the assertion
359 * in nouveau_bo_move() that makes sure we're not trying to
360 * move a pinned buffer
361 */
362 nvbo->pin_refcnt--;
363 ret = nouveau_bo_validate(nvbo, false, false);
364 if (ret)
365 goto out;
366 nvbo->pin_refcnt++;
367
368 switch (bo->mem.mem_type) {
369 case TTM_PL_VRAM:
370 drm->gem.vram_available -= bo->mem.size;
371 break;
372 case TTM_PL_TT:
373 drm->gem.gart_available -= bo->mem.size;
374 break;
375 default:
376 break;
377 }
378
379out:
380 if (force && ret)
381 nvbo->tile_flags |= NOUVEAU_GEM_TILE_NONCONTIG;
382 ttm_bo_unreserve(bo);
383 return ret;
384}
385
386int
387nouveau_bo_unpin(struct nouveau_bo *nvbo)
388{
389 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_bdev(nvbo->bo.bdev);
390 struct ttm_buffer_object *bo = &nvbo->bo;
391 int ret, ref;
392
393 ret = ttm_bo_reserve(bo, false, false, false, NULL);
394 if (ret)
395 return ret;
396
397 ref = --nvbo->pin_refcnt;
398 WARN_ON_ONCE(ref < 0);
399 if (ref)
400 goto out;
401
402 nouveau_bo_placement_set(nvbo, bo->mem.placement, 0);
403
404 ret = nouveau_bo_validate(nvbo, false, false);
405 if (ret == 0) {
406 switch (bo->mem.mem_type) {
407 case TTM_PL_VRAM:
408 drm->gem.vram_available += bo->mem.size;
409 break;
410 case TTM_PL_TT:
411 drm->gem.gart_available += bo->mem.size;
412 break;
413 default:
414 break;
415 }
416 }
417
418out:
419 ttm_bo_unreserve(bo);
420 return ret;
421}
422
423int
424nouveau_bo_map(struct nouveau_bo *nvbo)
425{
426 int ret;
427
428 ret = ttm_bo_reserve(&nvbo->bo, false, false, false, NULL);
429 if (ret)
430 return ret;
431
432 /*
433 * TTM buffers allocated using the DMA API already have a mapping, let's
434 * use it instead.
435 */
436 if (!nvbo->force_coherent)
437 ret = ttm_bo_kmap(&nvbo->bo, 0, nvbo->bo.mem.num_pages,
438 &nvbo->kmap);
439
440 ttm_bo_unreserve(&nvbo->bo);
441 return ret;
442}
443
444void
445nouveau_bo_unmap(struct nouveau_bo *nvbo)
446{
447 if (!nvbo)
448 return;
449
450 /*
451 * TTM buffers allocated using the DMA API already had a coherent
452 * mapping which we used, no need to unmap.
453 */
454 if (!nvbo->force_coherent)
455 ttm_bo_kunmap(&nvbo->kmap);
456}
457
458void
459nouveau_bo_sync_for_device(struct nouveau_bo *nvbo)
460{
461 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_bdev(nvbo->bo.bdev);
462 struct nvkm_device *device = nvxx_device(&drm->device);
463 struct ttm_dma_tt *ttm_dma = (struct ttm_dma_tt *)nvbo->bo.ttm;
464#ifndef __NetBSD__
465 int i;
466#endif
467
468 if (!ttm_dma)
469 return;
470
471 /* Don't waste time looping if the object is coherent */
472 if (nvbo->force_coherent)
473 return;
474
475#ifdef __NetBSD__
476 bus_dma_tag_t dmat = device->func->dma_tag(device);
477 bus_dmamap_sync(dmat, ttm_dma->dma_address, 0,
478 PAGE_SIZE*ttm_dma->ttm.num_pages,
479 BUS_DMASYNC_PREREAD|BUS_DMASYNC_PREWRITE);
480#else
481 for (i = 0; i < ttm_dma->ttm.num_pages; i++)
482 dma_sync_single_for_device(device->dev, ttm_dma->dma_address[i],
483 PAGE_SIZE, DMA_TO_DEVICE);
484#endif
485}
486
487void
488nouveau_bo_sync_for_cpu(struct nouveau_bo *nvbo)
489{
490 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_bdev(nvbo->bo.bdev);
491 struct nvkm_device *device = nvxx_device(&drm->device);
492 struct ttm_dma_tt *ttm_dma = (struct ttm_dma_tt *)nvbo->bo.ttm;
493#ifndef __NetBSD__
494 int i;
495#endif
496
497 if (!ttm_dma)
498 return;
499
500 /* Don't waste time looping if the object is coherent */
501 if (nvbo->force_coherent)
502 return;
503
504#ifdef __NetBSD__
505 bus_dma_tag_t dmat = device->func->dma_tag(device);
506 bus_dmamap_sync(dmat, ttm_dma->dma_address, 0,
507 PAGE_SIZE*ttm_dma->ttm.num_pages,
508 BUS_DMASYNC_POSTREAD|BUS_DMASYNC_POSTWRITE);
509#else
510 for (i = 0; i < ttm_dma->ttm.num_pages; i++)
511 dma_sync_single_for_cpu(device->dev, ttm_dma->dma_address[i],
512 PAGE_SIZE, DMA_FROM_DEVICE);
513#endif
514}
515
516int
517nouveau_bo_validate(struct nouveau_bo *nvbo, bool interruptible,
518 bool no_wait_gpu)
519{
520 int ret;
521
522 ret = ttm_bo_validate(&nvbo->bo, &nvbo->placement,
523 interruptible, no_wait_gpu);
524 if (ret)
525 return ret;
526
527 nouveau_bo_sync_for_device(nvbo);
528
529 return 0;
530}
531
532#ifdef __NetBSD__
533/*
534 * XXX Can't use bus_space here because this is all mapped through the
535 * radeon_bo abstraction. Can't assume we're x86 because this is
536 * Nouveau, not Intel.
537 */
538
539# define __iomem volatile
540# define __force
541# define ioread16_native fake_ioread16_native
542# define ioread32_native fake_ioread32_native
543# define iowrite16_native fake_iowrite16_native
544# define iowrite32_native fake_iowrite32_native
545
546#ifdef notdef
547static inline uint16_t
548ioread16_native(const void __iomem *ptr)
549{
550 uint16_t v;
551
552 v = *(const uint16_t __iomem *)ptr;
553 membar_consumer();
554
555 return v;
556}
557#endif
558
559static inline uint32_t
560ioread32_native(const void __iomem *ptr)
561{
562 uint32_t v;
563
564 v = *(const uint32_t __iomem *)ptr;
565 membar_consumer();
566
567 return v;
568}
569
570static inline void
571iowrite16_native(uint16_t v, void __iomem *ptr)
572{
573
574 membar_producer();
575 *(uint16_t __iomem *)ptr = v;
576}
577
578static inline void
579iowrite32_native(uint32_t v, void __iomem *ptr)
580{
581
582 membar_producer();
583 *(uint32_t __iomem *)ptr = v;
584}
585#endif
586
587static inline void *
588_nouveau_bo_mem_index(struct nouveau_bo *nvbo, unsigned index, void *mem, u8 sz)
589{
590#ifndef __NetBSD__
591 struct ttm_dma_tt *dma_tt;
592#endif
593 u8 *m = mem;
594
595 index *= sz;
596
597 if (m) {
598 /* kmap'd address, return the corresponding offset */
599 m += index;
600 } else {
601#ifdef __NetBSD__
602 panic("buffers of unusual mapping? I don't believe they exist");
603#else
604 /* DMA-API mapping, lookup the right address */
605 dma_tt = (struct ttm_dma_tt *)nvbo->bo.ttm;
606 m = dma_tt->cpu_address[index / PAGE_SIZE];
607 m += index % PAGE_SIZE;
608#endif
609 }
610
611 return m;
612}
613#define nouveau_bo_mem_index(o, i, m) _nouveau_bo_mem_index(o, i, m, sizeof(*m))
614
615void
616nouveau_bo_wr16(struct nouveau_bo *nvbo, unsigned index, u16 val)
617{
618 bool is_iomem;
619 u16 *mem = ttm_kmap_obj_virtual(&nvbo->kmap, &is_iomem);
620
621 mem = nouveau_bo_mem_index(nvbo, index, mem);
622
623 if (is_iomem)
624 iowrite16_native(val, (void __force __iomem *)mem);
625 else
626 *mem = val;
627}
628
629u32
630nouveau_bo_rd32(struct nouveau_bo *nvbo, unsigned index)
631{
632 bool is_iomem;
633 u32 *mem = ttm_kmap_obj_virtual(&nvbo->kmap, &is_iomem);
634
635 mem = nouveau_bo_mem_index(nvbo, index, mem);
636
637 if (is_iomem)
638 return ioread32_native((void __force __iomem *)mem);
639 else
640 return *mem;
641}
642
643void
644nouveau_bo_wr32(struct nouveau_bo *nvbo, unsigned index, u32 val)
645{
646 bool is_iomem;
647 u32 *mem = ttm_kmap_obj_virtual(&nvbo->kmap, &is_iomem);
648
649 mem = nouveau_bo_mem_index(nvbo, index, mem);
650
651 if (is_iomem)
652 iowrite32_native(val, (void __force __iomem *)mem);
653 else
654 *mem = val;
655}
656
657#ifdef __NetBSD__
658# undef __iomem
659# undef __force
660# undef ioread16_native
661# undef ioread32_native
662# undef iowrite16_native
663# undef iowrite32_native
664#endif
665
666static struct ttm_tt *
667nouveau_ttm_tt_create(struct ttm_bo_device *bdev, unsigned long size,
668 uint32_t page_flags, struct page *dummy_read)
669{
670#if IS_ENABLED(CONFIG_AGP)
671 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_bdev(bdev);
672
673 if (drm->agp.bridge) {
674 return ttm_agp_tt_create(bdev, drm->agp.bridge, size,
675 page_flags, dummy_read);
676 }
677#endif
678
679 return nouveau_sgdma_create_ttm(bdev, size, page_flags, dummy_read);
680}
681
682static int
683nouveau_bo_invalidate_caches(struct ttm_bo_device *bdev, uint32_t flags)
684{
685 /* We'll do this from user space. */
686 return 0;
687}
688
689static int
690nouveau_bo_init_mem_type(struct ttm_bo_device *bdev, uint32_t type,
691 struct ttm_mem_type_manager *man)
692{
693 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_bdev(bdev);
694
695 switch (type) {
696 case TTM_PL_SYSTEM:
697 man->flags = TTM_MEMTYPE_FLAG_MAPPABLE;
698 man->available_caching = TTM_PL_MASK_CACHING;
699 man->default_caching = TTM_PL_FLAG_CACHED;
700 break;
701 case TTM_PL_VRAM:
702 man->flags = TTM_MEMTYPE_FLAG_FIXED |
703 TTM_MEMTYPE_FLAG_MAPPABLE;
704 man->available_caching = TTM_PL_FLAG_UNCACHED |
705 TTM_PL_FLAG_WC;
706 man->default_caching = TTM_PL_FLAG_WC;
707
708 if (drm->device.info.family >= NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_TESLA) {
709 /* Some BARs do not support being ioremapped WC */
710 if (nvxx_bar(&drm->device)->iomap_uncached) {
711 man->available_caching = TTM_PL_FLAG_UNCACHED;
712 man->default_caching = TTM_PL_FLAG_UNCACHED;
713 }
714
715 man->func = &nouveau_vram_manager;
716 man->io_reserve_fastpath = false;
717 man->use_io_reserve_lru = true;
718 } else {
719 man->func = &ttm_bo_manager_func;
720 }
721 break;
722 case TTM_PL_TT:
723 if (drm->device.info.family >= NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_TESLA)
724 man->func = &nouveau_gart_manager;
725 else
726 if (!drm->agp.bridge)
727 man->func = &nv04_gart_manager;
728 else
729 man->func = &ttm_bo_manager_func;
730
731 if (drm->agp.bridge) {
732 man->flags = TTM_MEMTYPE_FLAG_MAPPABLE;
733 man->available_caching = TTM_PL_FLAG_UNCACHED |
734 TTM_PL_FLAG_WC;
735 man->default_caching = TTM_PL_FLAG_WC;
736 } else {
737 man->flags = TTM_MEMTYPE_FLAG_MAPPABLE |
738 TTM_MEMTYPE_FLAG_CMA;
739 man->available_caching = TTM_PL_MASK_CACHING;
740 man->default_caching = TTM_PL_FLAG_CACHED;
741 }
742
743 break;
744 default:
745 return -EINVAL;
746 }
747 return 0;
748}
749
750static void
751nouveau_bo_evict_flags(struct ttm_buffer_object *bo, struct ttm_placement *pl)
752{
753 struct nouveau_bo *nvbo = nouveau_bo(bo);
754
755 switch (bo->mem.mem_type) {
756 case TTM_PL_VRAM:
757 nouveau_bo_placement_set(nvbo, TTM_PL_FLAG_TT,
758 TTM_PL_FLAG_SYSTEM);
759 break;
760 default:
761 nouveau_bo_placement_set(nvbo, TTM_PL_FLAG_SYSTEM, 0);
762 break;
763 }
764
765 *pl = nvbo->placement;
766}
767
768
769static int
770nve0_bo_move_init(struct nouveau_channel *chan, u32 handle)
771{
772 int ret = RING_SPACE(chan, 2);
773 if (ret == 0) {
774 BEGIN_NVC0(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x0000, 1);
775 OUT_RING (chan, handle & 0x0000ffff);
776 FIRE_RING (chan);
777 }
778 return ret;
779}
780
781static int
782nve0_bo_move_copy(struct nouveau_channel *chan, struct ttm_buffer_object *bo,
783 struct ttm_mem_reg *old_mem, struct ttm_mem_reg *new_mem)
784{
785 struct nvkm_mem *node = old_mem->mm_node;
786 int ret = RING_SPACE(chan, 10);
787 if (ret == 0) {
788 BEGIN_NVC0(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x0400, 8);
789 OUT_RING (chan, upper_32_bits(node->vma[0].offset));
790 OUT_RING (chan, lower_32_bits(node->vma[0].offset));
791 OUT_RING (chan, upper_32_bits(node->vma[1].offset));
792 OUT_RING (chan, lower_32_bits(node->vma[1].offset));
793 OUT_RING (chan, PAGE_SIZE);
794 OUT_RING (chan, PAGE_SIZE);
795 OUT_RING (chan, PAGE_SIZE);
796 OUT_RING (chan, new_mem->num_pages);
797 BEGIN_IMC0(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x0300, 0x0386);
798 }
799 return ret;
800}
801
802static int
803nvc0_bo_move_init(struct nouveau_channel *chan, u32 handle)
804{
805 int ret = RING_SPACE(chan, 2);
806 if (ret == 0) {
807 BEGIN_NVC0(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x0000, 1);
808 OUT_RING (chan, handle);
809 }
810 return ret;
811}
812
813static int
814nvc0_bo_move_copy(struct nouveau_channel *chan, struct ttm_buffer_object *bo,
815 struct ttm_mem_reg *old_mem, struct ttm_mem_reg *new_mem)
816{
817 struct nvkm_mem *node = old_mem->mm_node;
818 u64 src_offset = node->vma[0].offset;
819 u64 dst_offset = node->vma[1].offset;
820 u32 page_count = new_mem->num_pages;
821 int ret;
822
823 page_count = new_mem->num_pages;
824 while (page_count) {
825 int line_count = (page_count > 8191) ? 8191 : page_count;
826
827 ret = RING_SPACE(chan, 11);
828 if (ret)
829 return ret;
830
831 BEGIN_NVC0(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x030c, 8);
832 OUT_RING (chan, upper_32_bits(src_offset));
833 OUT_RING (chan, lower_32_bits(src_offset));
834 OUT_RING (chan, upper_32_bits(dst_offset));
835 OUT_RING (chan, lower_32_bits(dst_offset));
836 OUT_RING (chan, PAGE_SIZE);
837 OUT_RING (chan, PAGE_SIZE);
838 OUT_RING (chan, PAGE_SIZE);
839 OUT_RING (chan, line_count);
840 BEGIN_NVC0(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x0300, 1);
841 OUT_RING (chan, 0x00000110);
842
843 page_count -= line_count;
844 src_offset += (PAGE_SIZE * line_count);
845 dst_offset += (PAGE_SIZE * line_count);
846 }
847
848 return 0;
849}
850
851static int
852nvc0_bo_move_m2mf(struct nouveau_channel *chan, struct ttm_buffer_object *bo,
853 struct ttm_mem_reg *old_mem, struct ttm_mem_reg *new_mem)
854{
855 struct nvkm_mem *node = old_mem->mm_node;
856 u64 src_offset = node->vma[0].offset;
857 u64 dst_offset = node->vma[1].offset;
858 u32 page_count = new_mem->num_pages;
859 int ret;
860
861 page_count = new_mem->num_pages;
862 while (page_count) {
863 int line_count = (page_count > 2047) ? 2047 : page_count;
864
865 ret = RING_SPACE(chan, 12);
866 if (ret)
867 return ret;
868
869 BEGIN_NVC0(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x0238, 2);
870 OUT_RING (chan, upper_32_bits(dst_offset));
871 OUT_RING (chan, lower_32_bits(dst_offset));
872 BEGIN_NVC0(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x030c, 6);
873 OUT_RING (chan, upper_32_bits(src_offset));
874 OUT_RING (chan, lower_32_bits(src_offset));
875 OUT_RING (chan, PAGE_SIZE); /* src_pitch */
876 OUT_RING (chan, PAGE_SIZE); /* dst_pitch */
877 OUT_RING (chan, PAGE_SIZE); /* line_length */
878 OUT_RING (chan, line_count);
879 BEGIN_NVC0(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x0300, 1);
880 OUT_RING (chan, 0x00100110);
881
882 page_count -= line_count;
883 src_offset += (PAGE_SIZE * line_count);
884 dst_offset += (PAGE_SIZE * line_count);
885 }
886
887 return 0;
888}
889
890static int
891nva3_bo_move_copy(struct nouveau_channel *chan, struct ttm_buffer_object *bo,
892 struct ttm_mem_reg *old_mem, struct ttm_mem_reg *new_mem)
893{
894 struct nvkm_mem *node = old_mem->mm_node;
895 u64 src_offset = node->vma[0].offset;
896 u64 dst_offset = node->vma[1].offset;
897 u32 page_count = new_mem->num_pages;
898 int ret;
899
900 page_count = new_mem->num_pages;
901 while (page_count) {
902 int line_count = (page_count > 8191) ? 8191 : page_count;
903
904 ret = RING_SPACE(chan, 11);
905 if (ret)
906 return ret;
907
908 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x030c, 8);
909 OUT_RING (chan, upper_32_bits(src_offset));
910 OUT_RING (chan, lower_32_bits(src_offset));
911 OUT_RING (chan, upper_32_bits(dst_offset));
912 OUT_RING (chan, lower_32_bits(dst_offset));
913 OUT_RING (chan, PAGE_SIZE);
914 OUT_RING (chan, PAGE_SIZE);
915 OUT_RING (chan, PAGE_SIZE);
916 OUT_RING (chan, line_count);
917 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x0300, 1);
918 OUT_RING (chan, 0x00000110);
919
920 page_count -= line_count;
921 src_offset += (PAGE_SIZE * line_count);
922 dst_offset += (PAGE_SIZE * line_count);
923 }
924
925 return 0;
926}
927
928static int
929nv98_bo_move_exec(struct nouveau_channel *chan, struct ttm_buffer_object *bo,
930 struct ttm_mem_reg *old_mem, struct ttm_mem_reg *new_mem)
931{
932 struct nvkm_mem *node = old_mem->mm_node;
933 int ret = RING_SPACE(chan, 7);
934 if (ret == 0) {
935 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x0320, 6);
936 OUT_RING (chan, upper_32_bits(node->vma[0].offset));
937 OUT_RING (chan, lower_32_bits(node->vma[0].offset));
938 OUT_RING (chan, upper_32_bits(node->vma[1].offset));
939 OUT_RING (chan, lower_32_bits(node->vma[1].offset));
940 OUT_RING (chan, 0x00000000 /* COPY */);
941 OUT_RING (chan, new_mem->num_pages << PAGE_SHIFT);
942 }
943 return ret;
944}
945
946static int
947nv84_bo_move_exec(struct nouveau_channel *chan, struct ttm_buffer_object *bo,
948 struct ttm_mem_reg *old_mem, struct ttm_mem_reg *new_mem)
949{
950 struct nvkm_mem *node = old_mem->mm_node;
951 int ret = RING_SPACE(chan, 7);
952 if (ret == 0) {
953 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x0304, 6);
954 OUT_RING (chan, new_mem->num_pages << PAGE_SHIFT);
955 OUT_RING (chan, upper_32_bits(node->vma[0].offset));
956 OUT_RING (chan, lower_32_bits(node->vma[0].offset));
957 OUT_RING (chan, upper_32_bits(node->vma[1].offset));
958 OUT_RING (chan, lower_32_bits(node->vma[1].offset));
959 OUT_RING (chan, 0x00000000 /* MODE_COPY, QUERY_NONE */);
960 }
961 return ret;
962}
963
964static int
965nv50_bo_move_init(struct nouveau_channel *chan, u32 handle)
966{
967 int ret = RING_SPACE(chan, 6);
968 if (ret == 0) {
969 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x0000, 1);
970 OUT_RING (chan, handle);
971 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x0180, 3);
972 OUT_RING (chan, chan->drm->ntfy.handle);
973 OUT_RING (chan, chan->vram.handle);
974 OUT_RING (chan, chan->vram.handle);
975 }
976
977 return ret;
978}
979
980static int
981nv50_bo_move_m2mf(struct nouveau_channel *chan, struct ttm_buffer_object *bo,
982 struct ttm_mem_reg *old_mem, struct ttm_mem_reg *new_mem)
983{
984 struct nvkm_mem *node = old_mem->mm_node;
985 u64 length = (new_mem->num_pages << PAGE_SHIFT);
986 u64 src_offset = node->vma[0].offset;
987 u64 dst_offset = node->vma[1].offset;
988 int src_tiled = !!node->memtype;
989 int dst_tiled = !!((struct nvkm_mem *)new_mem->mm_node)->memtype;
990 int ret;
991
992 while (length) {
993 u32 amount, stride, height;
994
995 ret = RING_SPACE(chan, 18 + 6 * (src_tiled + dst_tiled));
996 if (ret)
997 return ret;
998
999 amount = min(length, (u64)(4 * 1024 * 1024));
1000 stride = 16 * 4;
1001 height = amount / stride;
1002
1003 if (src_tiled) {
1004 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x0200, 7);
1005 OUT_RING (chan, 0);
1006 OUT_RING (chan, 0);
1007 OUT_RING (chan, stride);
1008 OUT_RING (chan, height);
1009 OUT_RING (chan, 1);
1010 OUT_RING (chan, 0);
1011 OUT_RING (chan, 0);
1012 } else {
1013 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x0200, 1);
1014 OUT_RING (chan, 1);
1015 }
1016 if (dst_tiled) {
1017 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x021c, 7);
1018 OUT_RING (chan, 0);
1019 OUT_RING (chan, 0);
1020 OUT_RING (chan, stride);
1021 OUT_RING (chan, height);
1022 OUT_RING (chan, 1);
1023 OUT_RING (chan, 0);
1024 OUT_RING (chan, 0);
1025 } else {
1026 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x021c, 1);
1027 OUT_RING (chan, 1);
1028 }
1029
1030 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x0238, 2);
1031 OUT_RING (chan, upper_32_bits(src_offset));
1032 OUT_RING (chan, upper_32_bits(dst_offset));
1033 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x030c, 8);
1034 OUT_RING (chan, lower_32_bits(src_offset));
1035 OUT_RING (chan, lower_32_bits(dst_offset));
1036 OUT_RING (chan, stride);
1037 OUT_RING (chan, stride);
1038 OUT_RING (chan, stride);
1039 OUT_RING (chan, height);
1040 OUT_RING (chan, 0x00000101);
1041 OUT_RING (chan, 0x00000000);
1042 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubCopy, NV_MEMORY_TO_MEMORY_FORMAT_NOP, 1);
1043 OUT_RING (chan, 0);
1044
1045 length -= amount;
1046 src_offset += amount;
1047 dst_offset += amount;
1048 }
1049
1050 return 0;
1051}
1052
1053static int
1054nv04_bo_move_init(struct nouveau_channel *chan, u32 handle)
1055{
1056 int ret = RING_SPACE(chan, 4);
1057 if (ret == 0) {
1058 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x0000, 1);
1059 OUT_RING (chan, handle);
1060 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubCopy, 0x0180, 1);
1061 OUT_RING (chan, chan->drm->ntfy.handle);
1062 }
1063
1064 return ret;
1065}
1066
1067static inline uint32_t
1068nouveau_bo_mem_ctxdma(struct ttm_buffer_object *bo,
1069 struct nouveau_channel *chan, struct ttm_mem_reg *mem)
1070{
1071 if (mem->mem_type == TTM_PL_TT)
1072 return NvDmaTT;
1073 return chan->vram.handle;
1074}
1075
1076static int
1077nv04_bo_move_m2mf(struct nouveau_channel *chan, struct ttm_buffer_object *bo,
1078 struct ttm_mem_reg *old_mem, struct ttm_mem_reg *new_mem)
1079{
1080 u32 src_offset = old_mem->start << PAGE_SHIFT;
1081 u32 dst_offset = new_mem->start << PAGE_SHIFT;
1082 u32 page_count = new_mem->num_pages;
1083 int ret;
1084
1085 ret = RING_SPACE(chan, 3);
1086 if (ret)
1087 return ret;
1088
1089 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubCopy, NV_MEMORY_TO_MEMORY_FORMAT_DMA_SOURCE, 2);
1090 OUT_RING (chan, nouveau_bo_mem_ctxdma(bo, chan, old_mem));
1091 OUT_RING (chan, nouveau_bo_mem_ctxdma(bo, chan, new_mem));
1092
1093 page_count = new_mem->num_pages;
1094 while (page_count) {
1095 int line_count = (page_count > 2047) ? 2047 : page_count;
1096
1097 ret = RING_SPACE(chan, 11);
1098 if (ret)
1099 return ret;
1100
1101 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubCopy,
1102 NV_MEMORY_TO_MEMORY_FORMAT_OFFSET_IN, 8);
1103 OUT_RING (chan, src_offset);
1104 OUT_RING (chan, dst_offset);
1105 OUT_RING (chan, PAGE_SIZE); /* src_pitch */
1106 OUT_RING (chan, PAGE_SIZE); /* dst_pitch */
1107 OUT_RING (chan, PAGE_SIZE); /* line_length */
1108 OUT_RING (chan, line_count);
1109 OUT_RING (chan, 0x00000101);
1110 OUT_RING (chan, 0x00000000);
1111 BEGIN_NV04(chan, NvSubCopy, NV_MEMORY_TO_MEMORY_FORMAT_NOP, 1);
1112 OUT_RING (chan, 0);
1113
1114 page_count -= line_count;
1115 src_offset += (PAGE_SIZE * line_count);
1116 dst_offset += (PAGE_SIZE * line_count);
1117 }
1118
1119 return 0;
1120}
1121
1122static int
1123nouveau_bo_move_prep(struct nouveau_drm *drm, struct ttm_buffer_object *bo,
1124 struct ttm_mem_reg *mem)
1125{
1126 struct nvkm_mem *old_node = bo->mem.mm_node;
1127 struct nvkm_mem *new_node = mem->mm_node;
1128 u64 size = (u64)mem->num_pages << PAGE_SHIFT;
1129 int ret;
1130
1131 ret = nvkm_vm_get(drm->client.vm, size, old_node->page_shift,
1132 NV_MEM_ACCESS_RW, &old_node->vma[0]);
1133 if (ret)
1134 return ret;
1135
1136 ret = nvkm_vm_get(drm->client.vm, size, new_node->page_shift,
1137 NV_MEM_ACCESS_RW, &old_node->vma[1]);
1138 if (ret) {
1139 nvkm_vm_put(&old_node->vma[0]);
1140 return ret;
1141 }
1142
1143 nvkm_vm_map(&old_node->vma[0], old_node);
1144 nvkm_vm_map(&old_node->vma[1], new_node);
1145 return 0;
1146}
1147
1148static int
1149nouveau_bo_move_m2mf(struct ttm_buffer_object *bo, int evict, bool intr,
1150 bool no_wait_gpu, struct ttm_mem_reg *new_mem)
1151{
1152 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_bdev(bo->bdev);
1153 struct nouveau_channel *chan = drm->ttm.chan;
1154 struct nouveau_cli *cli = (void *)chan->user.client;
1155 struct nouveau_fence *fence;
1156 int ret;
1157
1158 /* create temporary vmas for the transfer and attach them to the
1159 * old nvkm_mem node, these will get cleaned up after ttm has
1160 * destroyed the ttm_mem_reg
1161 */
1162 if (drm->device.info.family >= NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_TESLA) {
1163 ret = nouveau_bo_move_prep(drm, bo, new_mem);
1164 if (ret)
1165 return ret;
1166 }
1167
1168 mutex_lock_nested(&cli->mutex, SINGLE_DEPTH_NESTING);
1169 ret = nouveau_fence_sync(nouveau_bo(bo), chan, true, intr);
1170 if (ret == 0) {
1171 ret = drm->ttm.move(chan, bo, &bo->mem, new_mem);
1172 if (ret == 0) {
1173 ret = nouveau_fence_new(chan, false, &fence);
1174 if (ret == 0) {
1175 ret = ttm_bo_move_accel_cleanup(bo,
1176 &fence->base,
1177 evict,
1178 no_wait_gpu,
1179 new_mem);
1180 nouveau_fence_unref(&fence);
1181 }
1182 }
1183 }
1184 mutex_unlock(&cli->mutex);
1185 return ret;
1186}
1187
1188void
1189nouveau_bo_move_init(struct nouveau_drm *drm)
1190{
1191 static const struct {
1192 const char *name;
1193 int engine;
1194 s32 oclass;
1195 int (*exec)(struct nouveau_channel *,
1196 struct ttm_buffer_object *,
1197 struct ttm_mem_reg *, struct ttm_mem_reg *);
1198 int (*init)(struct nouveau_channel *, u32 handle);
1199 } _methods[] = {
1200 { "COPY", 4, 0xb0b5, nve0_bo_move_copy, nve0_bo_move_init },
1201 { "GRCE", 0, 0xb0b5, nve0_bo_move_copy, nvc0_bo_move_init },
1202 { "COPY", 4, 0xa0b5, nve0_bo_move_copy, nve0_bo_move_init },
1203 { "GRCE", 0, 0xa0b5, nve0_bo_move_copy, nvc0_bo_move_init },
1204 { "COPY1", 5, 0x90b8, nvc0_bo_move_copy, nvc0_bo_move_init },
1205 { "COPY0", 4, 0x90b5, nvc0_bo_move_copy, nvc0_bo_move_init },
1206 { "COPY", 0, 0x85b5, nva3_bo_move_copy, nv50_bo_move_init },
1207 { "CRYPT", 0, 0x74c1, nv84_bo_move_exec, nv50_bo_move_init },
1208 { "M2MF", 0, 0x9039, nvc0_bo_move_m2mf, nvc0_bo_move_init },
1209 { "M2MF", 0, 0x5039, nv50_bo_move_m2mf, nv50_bo_move_init },
1210 { "M2MF", 0, 0x0039, nv04_bo_move_m2mf, nv04_bo_move_init },
1211 {},
1212 { "CRYPT", 0, 0x88b4, nv98_bo_move_exec, nv50_bo_move_init },
1213 }, *mthd = _methods;
1214 const char *name = "CPU";
1215 int ret;
1216
1217 do {
1218 struct nouveau_channel *chan;
1219
1220 if (mthd->engine)
1221 chan = drm->cechan;
1222 else
1223 chan = drm->channel;
1224 if (chan == NULL)
1225 continue;
1226
1227 ret = nvif_object_init(&chan->user,
1228 mthd->oclass | (mthd->engine << 16),
1229 mthd->oclass, NULL, 0,
1230 &drm->ttm.copy);
1231 if (ret == 0) {
1232 ret = mthd->init(chan, drm->ttm.copy.handle);
1233 if (ret) {
1234 nvif_object_fini(&drm->ttm.copy);
1235 continue;
1236 }
1237
1238 drm->ttm.move = mthd->exec;
1239 drm->ttm.chan = chan;
1240 name = mthd->name;
1241 break;
1242 }
1243 } while ((++mthd)->exec);
1244
1245 NV_INFO(drm, "MM: using %s for buffer copies\n", name);
1246}
1247
1248static int
1249nouveau_bo_move_flipd(struct ttm_buffer_object *bo, bool evict, bool intr,
1250 bool no_wait_gpu, struct ttm_mem_reg *new_mem)
1251{
1252 struct ttm_place placement_memtype = {
1253 .fpfn = 0,
1254 .lpfn = 0,
1255 .flags = TTM_PL_FLAG_TT | TTM_PL_MASK_CACHING
1256 };
1257 struct ttm_placement placement;
1258 struct ttm_mem_reg tmp_mem;
1259 int ret;
1260
1261 placement.num_placement = placement.num_busy_placement = 1;
1262 placement.placement = placement.busy_placement = &placement_memtype;
1263
1264 tmp_mem = *new_mem;
1265 tmp_mem.mm_node = NULL;
1266 ret = ttm_bo_mem_space(bo, &placement, &tmp_mem, intr, no_wait_gpu);
1267 if (ret)
1268 return ret;
1269
1270 ret = ttm_tt_bind(bo->ttm, &tmp_mem);
1271 if (ret)
1272 goto out;
1273
1274 ret = nouveau_bo_move_m2mf(bo, true, intr, no_wait_gpu, &tmp_mem);
1275 if (ret)
1276 goto out;
1277
1278 ret = ttm_bo_move_ttm(bo, true, no_wait_gpu, new_mem);
1279out:
1280 ttm_bo_mem_put(bo, &tmp_mem);
1281 return ret;
1282}
1283
1284static int
1285nouveau_bo_move_flips(struct ttm_buffer_object *bo, bool evict, bool intr,
1286 bool no_wait_gpu, struct ttm_mem_reg *new_mem)
1287{
1288 struct ttm_place placement_memtype = {
1289 .fpfn = 0,
1290 .lpfn = 0,
1291 .flags = TTM_PL_FLAG_TT | TTM_PL_MASK_CACHING
1292 };
1293 struct ttm_placement placement;
1294 struct ttm_mem_reg tmp_mem;
1295 int ret;
1296
1297 placement.num_placement = placement.num_busy_placement = 1;
1298 placement.placement = placement.busy_placement = &placement_memtype;
1299
1300 tmp_mem = *new_mem;
1301 tmp_mem.mm_node = NULL;
1302 ret = ttm_bo_mem_space(bo, &placement, &tmp_mem, intr, no_wait_gpu);
1303 if (ret)
1304 return ret;
1305
1306 ret = ttm_bo_move_ttm(bo, true, no_wait_gpu, &tmp_mem);
1307 if (ret)
1308 goto out;
1309
1310 ret = nouveau_bo_move_m2mf(bo, true, intr, no_wait_gpu, new_mem);
1311 if (ret)
1312 goto out;
1313
1314out:
1315 ttm_bo_mem_put(bo, &tmp_mem);
1316 return ret;
1317}
1318
1319static void
1320nouveau_bo_move_ntfy(struct ttm_buffer_object *bo, struct ttm_mem_reg *new_mem)
1321{
1322 struct nouveau_bo *nvbo = nouveau_bo(bo);
1323 struct nvkm_vma *vma;
1324
1325 /* ttm can now (stupidly) pass the driver bos it didn't create... */
1326 if (bo->destroy != nouveau_bo_del_ttm)
1327 return;
1328
1329 list_for_each_entry(vma, &nvbo->vma_list, head) {
1330 if (new_mem && new_mem->mem_type != TTM_PL_SYSTEM &&
1331 (new_mem->mem_type == TTM_PL_VRAM ||
1332 nvbo->page_shift != vma->vm->mmu->lpg_shift)) {
1333 nvkm_vm_map(vma, new_mem->mm_node);
1334 } else {
1335 nvkm_vm_unmap(vma);
1336 }
1337 }
1338}
1339
1340static int
1341nouveau_bo_vm_bind(struct ttm_buffer_object *bo, struct ttm_mem_reg *new_mem,
1342 struct nouveau_drm_tile **new_tile)
1343{
1344 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_bdev(bo->bdev);
1345 struct drm_device *dev = drm->dev;
1346 struct nouveau_bo *nvbo = nouveau_bo(bo);
1347 u64 offset = new_mem->start << PAGE_SHIFT;
1348
1349 *new_tile = NULL;
1350 if (new_mem->mem_type != TTM_PL_VRAM)
1351 return 0;
1352
1353 if (drm->device.info.family >= NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_CELSIUS) {
1354 *new_tile = nv10_bo_set_tiling(dev, offset, new_mem->size,
1355 nvbo->tile_mode,
1356 nvbo->tile_flags);
1357 }
1358
1359 return 0;
1360}
1361
1362static void
1363nouveau_bo_vm_cleanup(struct ttm_buffer_object *bo,
1364 struct nouveau_drm_tile *new_tile,
1365 struct nouveau_drm_tile **old_tile)
1366{
1367 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_bdev(bo->bdev);
1368 struct drm_device *dev = drm->dev;
1369 struct fence *fence = reservation_object_get_excl(bo->resv);
1370
1371 nv10_bo_put_tile_region(dev, *old_tile, fence);
1372 *old_tile = new_tile;
1373}
1374
1375static int
1376nouveau_bo_move(struct ttm_buffer_object *bo, bool evict, bool intr,
1377 bool no_wait_gpu, struct ttm_mem_reg *new_mem)
1378{
1379 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_bdev(bo->bdev);
1380 struct nouveau_bo *nvbo = nouveau_bo(bo);
1381 struct ttm_mem_reg *old_mem = &bo->mem;
1382 struct nouveau_drm_tile *new_tile = NULL;
1383 int ret = 0;
1384
1385 if (nvbo->pin_refcnt)
1386 NV_WARN(drm, "Moving pinned object %p!\n", nvbo);
1387
1388 if (drm->device.info.family < NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_TESLA) {
1389 ret = nouveau_bo_vm_bind(bo, new_mem, &new_tile);
1390 if (ret)
1391 return ret;
1392 }
1393
1394 /* Fake bo copy. */
1395 if (old_mem->mem_type == TTM_PL_SYSTEM && !bo->ttm) {
1396 BUG_ON(bo->mem.mm_node != NULL);
1397 bo->mem = *new_mem;
1398 new_mem->mm_node = NULL;
1399 goto out;
1400 }
1401
1402 /* Hardware assisted copy. */
1403 if (drm->ttm.move) {
1404 if (new_mem->mem_type == TTM_PL_SYSTEM)
1405 ret = nouveau_bo_move_flipd(bo, evict, intr,
1406 no_wait_gpu, new_mem);
1407 else if (old_mem->mem_type == TTM_PL_SYSTEM)
1408 ret = nouveau_bo_move_flips(bo, evict, intr,
1409 no_wait_gpu, new_mem);
1410 else
1411 ret = nouveau_bo_move_m2mf(bo, evict, intr,
1412 no_wait_gpu, new_mem);
1413 if (!ret)
1414 goto out;
1415 }
1416
1417 /* Fallback to software copy. */
1418 ret = ttm_bo_wait(bo, true, intr, no_wait_gpu);
1419 if (ret == 0)
1420 ret = ttm_bo_move_memcpy(bo, evict, no_wait_gpu, new_mem);
1421
1422out:
1423 if (drm->device.info.family < NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_TESLA) {
1424 if (ret)
1425 nouveau_bo_vm_cleanup(bo, NULL, &new_tile);
1426 else
1427 nouveau_bo_vm_cleanup(bo, new_tile, &nvbo->tile);
1428 }
1429
1430 return ret;
1431}
1432
1433static int
1434nouveau_bo_verify_access(struct ttm_buffer_object *bo, struct file *filp)
1435{
1436 struct nouveau_bo *nvbo = nouveau_bo(bo);
1437
1438 return drm_vma_node_verify_access(&nvbo->gem.vma_node, filp);
1439}
1440
1441static int
1442nouveau_ttm_io_mem_reserve(struct ttm_bo_device *bdev, struct ttm_mem_reg *mem)
1443{
1444 struct ttm_mem_type_manager *man = &bdev->man[mem->mem_type];
1445 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_bdev(bdev);
1446 struct nvkm_device *device = nvxx_device(&drm->device);
1447 struct nvkm_mem *node = mem->mm_node;
1448 int ret;
1449
1450 mem->bus.addr = NULL;
1451 mem->bus.offset = 0;
1452 mem->bus.size = mem->num_pages << PAGE_SHIFT;
1453 mem->bus.base = 0;
1454 mem->bus.is_iomem = false;
1455 if (!(man->flags & TTM_MEMTYPE_FLAG_MAPPABLE))
1456 return -EINVAL;
1457 switch (mem->mem_type) {
1458 case TTM_PL_SYSTEM:
1459 /* System memory */
1460 return 0;
1461 case TTM_PL_TT:
1462#if IS_ENABLED(CONFIG_AGP)
1463 if (drm->agp.bridge) {
1464 mem->bus.offset = mem->start << PAGE_SHIFT;
1465 mem->bus.base = drm->agp.base;
1466 mem->bus.is_iomem = !drm->agp.cma;
1467 }
1468#endif
1469 if (drm->device.info.family < NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_TESLA || !node->memtype)
1470 /* untiled */
1471 break;
1472 /* fallthrough, tiled memory */
1473 case TTM_PL_VRAM:
1474 mem->bus.offset = mem->start << PAGE_SHIFT;
1475 mem->bus.base = device->func->resource_addr(device, 1);
1476 mem->bus.is_iomem = true;
1477 if (drm->device.info.family >= NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_TESLA) {
1478 struct nvkm_bar *bar = nvxx_bar(&drm->device);
1479 int page_shift = 12;
1480 if (drm->device.info.family >= NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_FERMI)
1481 page_shift = node->page_shift;
1482
1483 ret = nvkm_bar_umap(bar, node->size << 12, page_shift,
1484 &node->bar_vma);
1485 if (ret)
1486 return ret;
1487
1488 nvkm_vm_map(&node->bar_vma, node);
1489 mem->bus.offset = node->bar_vma.offset;
1490 }
1491 break;
1492 default:
1493 return -EINVAL;
1494 }
1495 return 0;
1496}
1497
1498static void
1499nouveau_ttm_io_mem_free(struct ttm_bo_device *bdev, struct ttm_mem_reg *mem)
1500{
1501 struct nvkm_mem *node = mem->mm_node;
1502
1503 if (!node->bar_vma.node)
1504 return;
1505
1506 nvkm_vm_unmap(&node->bar_vma);
1507 nvkm_vm_put(&node->bar_vma);
1508}
1509
1510static int
1511nouveau_ttm_fault_reserve_notify(struct ttm_buffer_object *bo)
1512{
1513 struct nouveau_drm *drm = nouveau_bdev(bo->bdev);
1514 struct nouveau_bo *nvbo = nouveau_bo(bo);
1515 struct nvkm_device *device = nvxx_device(&drm->device);
1516 u32 mappable = device->func->resource_size(device, 1) >> PAGE_SHIFT;
1517 int i, ret;
1518
1519 /* as long as the bo isn't in vram, and isn't tiled, we've got
1520 * nothing to do here.
1521 */
1522 if (bo->mem.mem_type != TTM_PL_VRAM) {
1523 if (drm->device.info.family < NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_TESLA ||
1524 !nouveau_bo_tile_layout(nvbo))
1525 return 0;
1526
1527 if (bo->mem.mem_type == TTM_PL_SYSTEM) {
1528 nouveau_bo_placement_set(nvbo, TTM_PL_TT, 0);
1529
1530 ret = nouveau_bo_validate(nvbo, false, false);
1531 if (ret)
1532 return ret;
1533 }
1534 return 0;
1535 }
1536
1537 /* make sure bo is in mappable vram */
1538 if (drm->device.info.family >= NV_DEVICE_INFO_V0_TESLA ||
1539 bo->mem.start + bo->mem.num_pages < mappable)
1540 return 0;
1541
1542 for (i = 0; i < nvbo->placement.num_placement; ++i) {
1543 nvbo->placements[i].fpfn = 0;
1544 nvbo->placements[i].lpfn = mappable;
1545 }
1546
1547 for (i = 0; i < nvbo->placement.num_busy_placement; ++i) {
1548 nvbo->busy_placements[i].fpfn = 0;
1549 nvbo->busy_placements[i].lpfn = mappable;
1550 }
1551
1552 nouveau_bo_placement_set(nvbo, TTM_PL_FLAG_VRAM, 0);
1553 return nouveau_bo_validate(nvbo, false, false);
1554}
1555
1556static int
1557nouveau_ttm_tt_populate(struct ttm_tt *ttm)
1558{
1559 struct ttm_dma_tt *ttm_dma = (void *)ttm;
1560 struct nouveau_drm *drm;
1561#ifndef __NetBSD__
1562 struct nvkm_device *device;
1563 struct drm_device *dev;
1564 struct device *pdev;
1565 unsigned i;
1566#endif
1567 int r;
1568 bool slave = !!(ttm->page_flags & TTM_PAGE_FLAG_SG);
1569
1570 if (ttm->state != tt_unpopulated)
1571 return 0;
1572
1573 if (slave && ttm->sg) {
1574 /* make userspace faulting work */
1575#ifdef __NetBSD__
1576 r = drm_prime_bus_dmamap_load_sgt(ttm->bdev->dmat,
1577 ttm_dma->dma_address, ttm->sg);
1578 if (r)
1579 return r;
1580#else
1581 drm_prime_sg_to_page_addr_arrays(ttm->sg, ttm->pages,
1582 ttm_dma->dma_address, ttm->num_pages);
1583#endif
1584 ttm->state = tt_unbound;
1585 return 0;
1586 }
1587
1588 drm = nouveau_bdev(ttm->bdev);
1589#ifndef __NetBSD__
1590 device = nvxx_device(&drm->device);
1591 dev = drm->dev;
1592 pdev = device->dev;
1593#endif
1594
1595 /*
1596 * Objects matching this condition have been marked as force_coherent,
1597 * so use the DMA API for them.
1598 */
1599 if (!nvxx_device(&drm->device)->func->cpu_coherent &&
1600 ttm->caching_state == tt_uncached)
1601#ifdef __NetBSD__
1602 return ttm_bus_dma_populate(ttm_dma);
1603#else
1604 return ttm_dma_populate(ttm_dma, dev->dev);
1605#endif
1606
1607#if IS_ENABLED(CONFIG_AGP)
1608 if (drm->agp.bridge) {
1609 return ttm_agp_tt_populate(ttm);
1610 }
1611#endif
1612
1613#ifdef __NetBSD__
1614 return ttm_bus_dma_populate(ttm_dma);
1615#else
1616#ifdef CONFIG_SWIOTLB
1617 if (swiotlb_nr_tbl()) {
1618 return ttm_dma_populate((void *)ttm, dev->dev);
1619 }
1620#endif
1621
1622 r = ttm_pool_populate(ttm);
1623 if (r) {
1624 return r;
1625 }
1626
1627 for (i = 0; i < ttm->num_pages; i++) {
1628 dma_addr_t addr;
1629
1630 addr = dma_map_page(pdev, ttm->pages[i], 0, PAGE_SIZE,
1631 DMA_BIDIRECTIONAL);
1632
1633 if (dma_mapping_error(pdev, addr)) {
1634 while (--i) {
1635 dma_unmap_page(pdev, ttm_dma->dma_address[i],
1636 PAGE_SIZE, DMA_BIDIRECTIONAL);
1637 ttm_dma->dma_address[i] = 0;
1638 }
1639 ttm_pool_unpopulate(ttm);
1640 return -EFAULT;
1641 }
1642
1643 ttm_dma->dma_address[i] = addr;
1644 }
1645 return 0;
1646#endif
1647}
1648
1649static void
1650nouveau_ttm_tt_unpopulate(struct ttm_tt *ttm)
1651{
1652 struct ttm_dma_tt *ttm_dma = (void *)ttm;
1653 struct nouveau_drm *drm;
1654#ifndef __NetBSD__
1655 struct nvkm_device *device;
1656 struct drm_device *dev;
1657 struct device *pdev;
1658 unsigned i;
1659#endif
1660 bool slave = !!(ttm->page_flags & TTM_PAGE_FLAG_SG);
1661
1662 if (slave)
1663 return;
1664
1665 drm = nouveau_bdev(ttm->bdev);
1666#ifndef __NetBSD__
1667 device = nvxx_device(&drm->device);
1668 dev = drm->dev;
1669 pdev = device->dev;
1670#endif
1671
1672 /*
1673 * Objects matching this condition have been marked as force_coherent,
1674 * so use the DMA API for them.
1675 */
1676 if (!nvxx_device(&drm->device)->func->cpu_coherent &&
1677 ttm->caching_state == tt_uncached) {
1678#ifdef __NetBSD__
1679 ttm_bus_dma_unpopulate(ttm_dma);
1680#else
1681 ttm_dma_unpopulate(ttm_dma, dev->dev);
1682#endif
1683 return;
1684 }
1685
1686#if IS_ENABLED(CONFIG_AGP)
1687 if (drm->agp.bridge) {
1688 ttm_agp_tt_unpopulate(ttm);
1689 return;
1690 }
1691#endif
1692
1693#ifdef __NetBSD__
1694 ttm_bus_dma_unpopulate(ttm_dma);
1695#else
1696#ifdef CONFIG_SWIOTLB
1697 if (swiotlb_nr_tbl()) {
1698 ttm_dma_unpopulate((void *)ttm, dev->dev);
1699 return;
1700 }
1701#endif
1702
1703 for (i = 0; i < ttm->num_pages; i++) {
1704 if (ttm_dma->dma_address[i]) {
1705 dma_unmap_page(pdev, ttm_dma->dma_address[i], PAGE_SIZE,
1706 DMA_BIDIRECTIONAL);
1707 }
1708 }
1709
1710 ttm_pool_unpopulate(ttm);
1711#endif
1712}
1713
1714#ifdef __NetBSD__
1715static void
1716nouveau_ttm_tt_swapout(struct ttm_tt *ttm)
1717{
1718 struct ttm_dma_tt *ttm_dma = container_of(ttm, struct ttm_dma_tt, ttm);
1719
1720 ttm_bus_dma_swapout(ttm_dma);
1721}
1722#endif
1723
1724void
1725nouveau_bo_fence(struct nouveau_bo *nvbo, struct nouveau_fence *fence, bool exclusive)
1726{
1727 struct reservation_object *resv = nvbo->bo.resv;
1728
1729 if (exclusive)
1730 reservation_object_add_excl_fence(resv, &fence->base);
1731 else if (fence)
1732 reservation_object_add_shared_fence(resv, &fence->base);
1733}
1734
1735#ifdef __NetBSD__
1736static const struct uvm_pagerops nouveau_uvm_ops = {
1737 .pgo_reference = &ttm_bo_uvm_reference,
1738 .pgo_detach = &ttm_bo_uvm_detach,
1739 .pgo_fault = &ttm_bo_uvm_fault,
1740};
1741#endif
1742
1743struct ttm_bo_driver nouveau_bo_driver = {
1744 .ttm_tt_create = &nouveau_ttm_tt_create,
1745 .ttm_tt_populate = &nouveau_ttm_tt_populate,
1746 .ttm_tt_unpopulate = &nouveau_ttm_tt_unpopulate,
1747#ifdef __NetBSD__
1748 .ttm_tt_swapout = &nouveau_ttm_tt_swapout,
1749 .ttm_uvm_ops = &nouveau_uvm_ops,
1750#endif
1751 .invalidate_caches = nouveau_bo_invalidate_caches,
1752 .init_mem_type = nouveau_bo_init_mem_type,
1753 .evict_flags = nouveau_bo_evict_flags,
1754 .move_notify = nouveau_bo_move_ntfy,
1755 .move = nouveau_bo_move,
1756 .verify_access = nouveau_bo_verify_access,
1757 .fault_reserve_notify = &nouveau_ttm_fault_reserve_notify,
1758 .io_mem_reserve = &nouveau_ttm_io_mem_reserve,
1759 .io_mem_free = &nouveau_ttm_io_mem_free,
1760};
1761
1762struct nvkm_vma *
1763nouveau_bo_vma_find(struct nouveau_bo *nvbo, struct nvkm_vm *vm)
1764{
1765 struct nvkm_vma *vma;
1766 list_for_each_entry(vma, &nvbo->vma_list, head) {
1767 if (vma->vm == vm)
1768 return vma;
1769 }
1770
1771 return NULL;
1772}
1773
1774int
1775nouveau_bo_vma_add(struct nouveau_bo *nvbo, struct nvkm_vm *vm,
1776 struct nvkm_vma *vma)
1777{
1778 const u32 size = nvbo->bo.mem.num_pages << PAGE_SHIFT;
1779 int ret;
1780
1781 ret = nvkm_vm_get(vm, size, nvbo->page_shift,
1782 NV_MEM_ACCESS_RW, vma);
1783 if (ret)
1784 return ret;
1785
1786 if ( nvbo->bo.mem.mem_type != TTM_PL_SYSTEM &&
1787 (nvbo->bo.mem.mem_type == TTM_PL_VRAM ||
1788 nvbo->page_shift != vma->vm->mmu->lpg_shift))
1789 nvkm_vm_map(vma, nvbo->bo.mem.mm_node);
1790
1791 list_add_tail(&vma->head, &nvbo->vma_list);
1792 vma->refcount = 1;
1793 return 0;
1794}
1795
1796void
1797nouveau_bo_vma_del(struct nouveau_bo *nvbo, struct nvkm_vma *vma)
1798{
1799 if (vma->node) {
1800 if (nvbo->bo.mem.mem_type != TTM_PL_SYSTEM)
1801 nvkm_vm_unmap(vma);
1802 nvkm_vm_put(vma);
1803 list_del(&vma->head);
1804 }
1805}
